title: Mortgatha
description: Clarie Perl has opened up a roaming door to the shadow realm of Mortgatha. Though she is accidentally pushed into the Darkness, she and her friends look for a way back to the Earth world. The problem is that the door back home moves and the Darkness wants to keep her there. Through three stories, Clarie tries to find a way to keep Darkness from Earth and return Mortgatha back to the Light.
author: Donna Hawk
